set.seed(53079239)

### Contruct a Brownian Motion 

```{r brownian-motion, fig.height = 4, fig.cap = "Simple Brownian Motion"}
x <- cumsum(rnorm(100))
plot(x)
```

The mean of this Brownian Motion is $\mu = $ `r mean(x)`.
